text: Several Canadian naval units have been named HMCS Iroquois. *, a Second World War Tribal-class destroyer. *, an Iroquois-class (or New-Tribal-class) destroyer commissioned in 1972. Battle honours *Atlantic, 1943 *Arctic, 1943–1945 *Biscay, 1943–1944 *Norway, 1945 *Korea, 1952–1953 * Arabian Sea ==References== *Directory of History and Heritage - HMCS Iroquois * South-West Asia Theatre Honours Category:Royal Canadian Navy ship names
title: HMCS Iroquois
